materials.raw_text:
Barium Carbonate (BaCO3): 120 g
Lithium Carbonate (Li2CO3): 40 g
Lead Oxide (PbO): 150 g
Tin (Sn): 80 g

preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure the precise amounts of each ingredient using a digital scale.

3. Use a spatula to mix thoroughly until a uniform powder is obtained.
